arts.ttl: Burnley vs Nottingham Forest – Match Preview and Team News
arts.sum: Burnley and Nottingham Forest clash in a crucial Premier League encounter at Turf Moor on Saturday, with both struggling sides desperate for a victory. The match pits a Burnley team whose encouraging performances have been undone by heartbreaking late defeats against a Forest side in turmoil. New manager Ange Postecoglou is already under pressure after […] The post Burnley vs Nottingham Forest – Match Preview and Team News first appeared on The Football Faithful.
